title: Free Second Sunday at the Whitney
description: Celebrate the Whitney’s 10th year in the Meatpacking with live music, art-making, and free admission all day.
aiSummary: Free art, music, and community at the Whitney Museum’s Second Sunday celebration. Perfect for ambient indoor field capture.
studioNotes: Explore transitions between gallery halls; binaural mic at stairwells. Avoid main lobby during peak.
